question: The variations of resistivity $\rho$ with absolute temperature T for three different materials X, Y and Z are shown in the graph below. Identify the materials X, Y and Z.
images/a3b4c5d6-e7f8-4a9b-0c1d-2e3f4a5b6c7d.png
choices: X copper, Y - semiconductor, Z - nichrome
X copper, Y - nichrome, Z - semiconductor
explanation: X shows a non-linear increase typical of conductors at low temp/pure metals (Copper).
Y shows a linear increase with a non-zero intercept, typical of alloys (Nichrome).
Z shows a decrease in resistivity with temperature, typical of semiconductors.
